by.

-Making the track was really fun!
-Nick Elle played a big role on filling up the track and arranging it and we cant pass on that singing :slight_smile:

item.title: Only You - Sylent & Nick Elle [DEEP HOUSE]
item.dc:creator: akabillposters
item.description:
Heh, Neither. Go add #sylent to all your other tracks.

And Nick could/should go do the same, adding #nick elle to all his other tracks, if that’s a tag he wants to target.

 
(I wasn’t really focussing on the caps casing.)

 
(Note: Fwiw, sylent/#sylent tag will have limited additional benefit, as it has no meaning other than as artist name. So, if anyone searches for sylent/#sylent, chances are they’re searching for you (or someone else with that name), so they’ll most likely look at People, rather than Tracks in the search results.)

Read full topic
item.source: Only You - Sylent & Nick Elle [DEEP HOUSE]

item.title: Only You - Sylent & Nick Elle [DEEP HOUSE]
item.dc:creator: Sylent
item.description:
i quite don’t understand lol.
What should i do delete sylent and nick elle from tags?
or should i add #sylent and nick elle without capitals?
sorry lol.

Read full topic
item.source: Only You - Sylent & Nick Elle [DEEP HOUSE]

item.title: Only You - Sylent & Nick Elle [DEEP HOUSE]
item.dc:creator: akabillposters
item.description:
Sylent:

Isnt that how the tags work?

Yeah, but presumably, they might want to see everything you’ve done, or everything nick elle has done, not just one track.

Not saying don’t use them. Just saying that you might want searchers to find more than one of your tracks, hence…

retrospectively adding #nick elle and #sylent tags to your respective work

…keeping in mind that you’ll already appear in a search for ‘sylent’ because it’s your profile name.

Read full topic
item.source: Only You - Sylent & Nick Elle [DEEP HOUSE]

Yes its a search term so when they search nick elle
Or sylent this track will be in the results
Isnt that how the tags work?

item.source: Only You - Sylent & Nick Elle [DEEP HOUSE]

item.title: Only You - Sylent & Nick Elle [DEEP HOUSE]
item.dc:creator: akabillposters
item.description:
Slight side-topic, but Re: SC tags…

 

 
Keep in mind that tags also function as a search link/term…

…so, I’d recommend retrospectively adding #nick elle and #sylent tags to your respective work.

 
Currently, #Nick Elle points to zero other tracks on SC and #Sylent points to one other track on SC (which doesn’t seem related to you).

Read full topic
item.source: Only You - Sylent & Nick Elle [DEEP HOUSE]
